title: Post-operative site infections among surgical patients at Southern Ethiopia: A prospective cohort study

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Mohammed Abdu Seid, Misganaw Asmamaw Mengstie, Assefa Agegnehu Teshome, Kedir Abdu, Yonas Derso Abtew
